title: [Not Verizon] Ping a Steady 142 up from 26

replies.body:
This part....

> I couldn't even ult because by the time my ult went off everyone was far away

sounds like you were having some serious packet loss, which I'd wanna check for that first before going much deeper. Run a trace route using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to 104.160.131.1 for about 10 minutes and post the results here so I can take a look.
